rate(uint256,uint256,uint256,bool,uint25.details: the amount returned represents the total amount which is to be locked. This means that any amount returned represents the option's purchase price and the pool's stake combined.

params.k: true for call false for put (not used in this RateCalc)
params.l: the current amount of locked ETH
params.s: stack, how many open options there are already in this direction
params.t: time/rounds for the option  (not used in this RateCalc)
params.tP: the amount of tokens currently stored in the active pool
